body.name: ZINUS 12 Inch Comfort Support Cooling Gel Hybrid Mattress, Tight Top Innerspring Mattress, Motion Isolating Pocket Springs, Mattress-in-a-Box, King

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: General Note: Please allow 24 - 72 hours for your Mattress to regain its full shape. Any memory foam will expand faster in a warmer room. In cold temperature, at delivery, your mattress may take a bit longer to return to full sized from its compressed state.The expansion time of the mattress will vary as per the surrounding

COOL, SUPPORTIVE, LUXURIOUS – With the unmatched support of steel pocket springs and conforming softness of Zinus foams, this cooling gel-infused hybrid is the one you’ll depend on for cool, luxurious, and pressure-relieving sleep

UNDISTURBED COMFORT – Made with CertiPUR-US certified gel memory foam and Zinus Comfort Foam, plus a base layer of pocketed springs for enveloping support that alleviates pressure points, eases sore joints, and isolates motion from a sleeping partner
SLEEP COOLER AND CALMER – Cooling gel-infused memory foam helps circulate air, dispelling excess heat so you can maintain an optimal sleeping temperature without overheating

EXPERTLY PACKAGED – This mattress is efficiently compressed into one box that’s easily shipped and maneuvered into the bedroom; simply unbox, unroll, and this mattress does the rest, expanding to its original shape within 72 hours
Worry-free 10 year limited warranty included; twin mattress supports a maximum weight of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs
body.description: The power of a solid night’s sleep can never be underestimated. And getting that sleep on a premium cooling mattress that didn’t cost an arm and a leg used to be a difficult feat. Until now. The Comfort Support Cooling Gel Hybrid Mattress is a top-quality design in a league of its own. This mattress features a soft fiber padded euro top, cooling gel-infused memory foam, and Zinus Comfort Foam that envelops your shape to relax tired joints and muscles. Cooling gel memory foam on top also whisks away excess body heat so you can maintain an optimal sleeping temperature all night long. A foundation of individually wrapped steel pocket springs assists with spinal support and also keeps motion from a sleeping partner away from your side of the bed. Built to last with reliable construction and only the best CertiPUR-US certified foams, the Comfort Support Cooling Gel Hybrid will deliver restorative rest for years on end. All packed in one box with peace of mind in the form of our 10-year worry-free warranty, this first-rate bed is confidence you can sleep on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Comfort and Cooling - A Dream Mattress!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the ZINUS 10 Inch Comfort Support Cooling Gel Hybrid Mattress, and it has been an absolute game-changer for my sleep quality. I cannot express enough how impressed I am with this mattress.First and foremost, comfort is paramount, and this mattress delivers it in abundance. The combination of memory foam and individually wrapped coils provides the perfect blend of support and contouring to my body. I wake up feeling refreshed and without any aches or pains. It's like sleeping on a cloud!The cooling gel feature is a real game-changer, especially for someone like me who tends to get hot during the night. The gel-infused foam works wonders in regulating the temperature, keeping me cool and sweat-free throughout the night. I no longer have to toss and turn, searching for a cool spot on the bed.In terms of quality, the ZINUS 10 Inch Comfort Support Cooling Gel Hybrid Mattress is top-notch. The construction feels solid and durable, and the stitching is flawless. Additionally, the mattress comes with a 10-year warranty, which is a testament to the manufacturer's confidence in their product.Another standout feature is the motion isolation. My partner's movements during the night no longer disturb my sleep, thanks to the individually wrapped coils that absorb and minimize motion transfer. It's truly a blessing for light sleepers or those who share their bed with a restless partner.Setting up the mattress was a breeze. It arrived conveniently compressed in a box, and once unboxed and placed on the bed frame, it expanded to its full size within a few hours. No hassle, no fuss!One minor downside worth mentioning is the initial off-gassing smell that is common with most memory foam mattresses. However, it dissipates within a day or two, and I haven't noticed any lingering odor since.Overall, I highly recommend the ZINUS 10 Inch Comfort Support Cooling Gel Hybrid Mattress to anyone in search of a luxurious and supportive sleep experience. Its combination of comfort, cooling technology, and durability make it worth every penny. Trust me, you won't be disappointed with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bed for a modest budget
reviews.reviewText: I recently decided to downsize and get a full sized bed instead of the queen I've had for years. I researched and shopped for maybe 6 months at different retailers. A lady I pet sit for has this same mattress, so decided to order it and give it a try. I have had the mattress about a month now and have been sleeping well on it. It's a medium firm mattress, it does provide comfort and didn't break my budget. My cat and dog also approve of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We’ve been using this mattress for about a month and a half now. For the price we paid I’ve been really really happy with the quality. I was having a lot of back pain sleeping on our old mattress. It was nearly 10 years old and it was definitely time for an upgrade. I was a little skeptical because of the price but I’m really happy. I listen to a lot of the positive reviews. I’ve had no back pain at all since getting his mattress. It’s very supportive, the perfect combination of soft and firm. The only negative I could say, is at the box was delivered and was very badly damaged, so it was difficult to move around and bring inside. Also, if you do sit on the end of the bed, it sinks down a bit and isn’t the most supportive on the very edges. I’m definitely a larger woman and my husband is a little above average. This mattress supportive and has been great for last month and a half. Such a good bargain too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We got this for guest bedroom and it is better than expected! Just soft enough with the right amount of support. Easy to unpack and set up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress for a great price!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Originally bought this for our guest bedroom but loved it so much we swapped it out for our mattress. We went with the 12 inch so it had more support and cushion. It feels so comfy and cushy to sleep on and looks great on the bed! Highly recommend going with this brand if you want something affordable and it delivers compact so you don’t have to transport yourself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this bed! Great price point.
reviews.reviewText: Want a bed that’s not going to break the bank? This is the bed!! It’s definitely medium plush and is such a great bed. Going to recommend this to everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm but comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly more comfortable than I thought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Too firm for me, acquired back and hip pain sleeping on this mattress. I'm petite 110 lbs and felt like I was sleeping on a piece of foam on top of concrete. Definitely not one size fits all.

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing mattress, specially for the price paid.
reviews.reviewText: Great cost-benefit. It is super comfortable, not to stiff, not too soft, it really holds my wait ant it adjusts to the body's curves (neck, hips, etc). Have been having great night sleeps since it arrived! I also love that it is high!
Is like sleeping over a pillow, super comfortable and well made, just have to wait for about 72 hr, and ready to go. This mattress is very well made at a great price as well.
Mattress is good we did add a memory foam topper as it was fairly firm.
Great for stomach sleepers. Moulds to your body without being to soft!

I’ve only been using it for a few days, but OMG I cannot get over the quality of this mattress. It’s soft (body sinks in the foam) but also super supportive!!!! It’s so so so comfortable and for the PRICE!!! 100% must buy. We waited 36 hours to use it, it was perfect by then.
